meanings.sent1: She outlearned her classmates by studying every day.
meanings.sent2: He always tries to outlearn others in his quest for knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The student outlearned the teacher in a surprising turn of events.
meanings.sent4: Her thirst for knowledge allowed her to outlearn everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: Outlearning others became her passion and drive.

meanings.sent1: He felt proud to be the most outlearned student in the class.
meanings.sent2: She was considered the most outlearned scholar in the university.
meanings.sent3: Being the most outlearned in the group, he was often sought for advice.
meanings.sent4: Her outlearned nature made her a valuable asset to the team.
meanings.sent5: His outlearned abilities set him apart from his peers.
